item.title: How to Make a Custom Contact Form for Free
item.author: Author
item.description: Every website needs a contact form. It is one way for the user to communicate with you directly. This post is about some ways to make a free contact page. Warning This solution is for the case where much traffic is not expected. It can handle at most take 5 form submissions per second. View: HTML and CSS If you are new to HTML forms and styling, an excellent resource is available on Mozilla web docs.
